name: cleentfaar/tissue
description: A PHP library that scans your files for viruses using the adapter of your choice

suggests.cleentfaar/tissue-clamav-adapter: A Tissue adapter to scan files using the ClamAV anti-virus engine
suggests.cleentfaar/tissue-clamavphp-adapter: A Tissue adapter to scan files using the PHP-extension of the ClamAV anti-virus engine
